body.subsection:
The results of runnning diagnostic tasks are logged by Log4j as configured by your configuration . Results can also be retrieved directly from the SelfDiagnoseServlet.
Log file
SelfDiagnose uses Log4j logging to report the results of each Diagnostic Task. By specifiying a different logger in the
log4j configuration
, the results can be written to a separate file. View the
example
Usage:/selfdiagnose?format=log.
HTML page
In response to sending a request to the SelfDiagnoseServlet, the result are shown by a HTML page that contains the same information that can be found in the log file. View the example
Usage:/selfdiagnose.
XML document
In response to sending a request to the SelfDiagnoseServlet, the result are shown by a HTML page that contains the same information that can be found in the log file. View the example
Usage:/selfdiagnose?format=xml.
